mapper.select: select couple_num,mid,fid, (select name as 남자이름 from ling_member where id = (select mid from couple co , ling_member m where m.id=#{id} and ((co.fid =m.id) or (co.mid = m.id)))) as mname, (select name as 여자이름 from ling_member where id = (select fid from couple co , ling_member m where m.id=#{id} and ((co.fid =m.id) or (co.mid = m.id)))) as fname, trunc(sysdate-create_date,0) as day from couple co, ling_member m where ((co.fid =m.id) or (co.mid = m.id)) and m.id=#{id}
